text: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Say, "To Allah belongs [the right to allow] intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned."
translation.id.indonesian: Katakanlah: "Hanya kepunyaan Allah syafa'at itu semuanya. Kepunyaan-Nya kerajaan langit dan bumi. Kemudian kepada-Nya-lah kamu dikembalikan"
